title: K-12 Islamic Funeral Management Education Using Signal Principle-Based VR

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of Islamic etiquette and funeral culture
context.additional_context: Solving real-world funeral procedure and spatial constraints via VR simulation, enhancing learning transfer effects through signal principle application

learning_goals: Students can perform Islamic funeral procedures (preparation, shrouding, burial, etc.) in a VR environment with 90% accuracy
Learners can independently reproduce complex funeral stages with over 80% accuracy by utilizing signaling principles (visual/auditory cues)
Within four weeks of completing the training, learners achieve 75% or higher transfer-of-learning outcomes by demonstrating field-applicable funeral management competencies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
